attributes.action: indroduce much stricter planning regualations in rural areas to combat urbanisation and to ensure green belt land remains green.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In Britain today, buildings are going up left right and center. This is causing problems in the country side as cities are growing and country side is becoming more like a dispersed town.

By making it more difficult to build on rural and greenbelt land, this will directly combat this amjor problem in Our country.

Please sign and send a clear message to The PM that something needs to be done before our green island becomes one great conurbation.
